title: Embroidered Picture (England), 1721
medium:
Medium: silk and wool embroidery on linen foundation, applied to silk
Technique: embroidered in split and stem stitches on plain weave foundation and appliqued to plain weave backing
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Portrait of King George III embroidered on linen, which was later appliqued to a silk ground fabric.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture (England), 1721. Medium: silk and wool embroidery on linen foundation, applied to silk
Technique: embroidered in split and stem stitches on plain weave foundation and appliqued to plain weave backing. 
Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection. 1975-81-5
